caption.title: Comparison of the synthetic virus and the Fermon strain in NtAbs using 50 adult serum samples.
caption.p: a Comparison of the NtAbs of anti-EV-D68 against the synthetic virus and Fermon ( p = 0.0378). b The correlation of NtAbs against EV-D68 between the synthetic virus and Fermon ( r = 0.444)
